#summary First run zxing at Galileo

= Introduction =

First run zxing at Galileo.
assumption: has the Open JDK image on your clanton.


= Details =

1. Change your board time to current time so that you can install node-zxing on your Galileo

2. Install node-zing

{{{
root@clanton:~# date -s "13 APR 2014 11:13:00"
Sun Apr 13 11:13:00 UTC 2014
root@clanton:~# npm install node-zxing
npm http GET https://registry.npmjs.org/node-zxing
npm http 200 https://registry.npmjs.org/node-zxing
npm http GET https://registry.npmjs.org/node-zxing/-/node-zxing-0.0.1.tgz
npm http 200 https://registry.npmjs.org/node-zxing/-/node-zxing-0.0.1.tgz
node-zxing@0.0.1 node_modules/node-zxing
}}}

3. Copy code to Galileo use *sftp*


{{{
hai@hai-Inspiron-1545:~/Galileo/hcsolution-diy-hh/V3_Galileo/Code/NodeJS$ sftp root@192.168.0.103
Connected to 192.168.0.103.
sftp> put hello.js
Uploading hello.js to /home/root/hello.js
hello.js                                                                                                      100%  265     0.3KB/s   00:00

Uploading hellozxing.js to /home/root/hellozxing.js

zxinglib/ is not a regular file

Uploading zxinglib/ to /home/root/zxinglib
zxinglib/ is not a regular file

sftp> ls

Uploading zxinglib/core/core.jar to /home/root/core.jar
zxinglib/core/core.jar                                                                                        100%  263KB 263.1KB/s   00:01

4. test hello.js and hellozxing.js

{{{
